# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number:** WS4158550160-Doc4235651822
* **Title:** Vertical Tillage Unit
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4158550160
* **Publication Date:** October 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Background**

This government tender announcement is a request for proposal (RFP) from the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC). The tender aims to acquire one vertical tillage disc for the Morden Research and Development Centre (RDC) in Canada.

**Delivery**

The successful bidder will be required to supply, deliver, install, and provide operator training for the vertical tillage disc. The delivery location is the Morden Research and Development Centre (RDC).

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Contact Information**

For more information about this tender, please contact:

Andre Myers-Labbe
Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [andre.myers-labbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andre.myers-labbe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information**

The tender description, including the terms and conditions, can be found at the following URL:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17744749?extsite=MTc3NDQ3NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date and time. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
